content:
ADDENDUM: fix_streams() optionality

on reflection  SovereignAgent should call fix_streams() in __init__

but tools without auth (score.py, future public tools) should still access fix_streams() directly

so:
  from enclave_shared.unicode_fix import fix_streams  # still works
  from enclave_shared.sovereign_agent import SovereignAgent  # also calls it

no gate. both paths open.

間
